DOC.brief_summary: To examine retrospectively whether transcatheter closure interatrial septum lead myocardial injury determine mechanism .
DOC.brief_title: Cardiac Troponin T After Transcatheter Closure Interatrial Septum
DOC.detailed_description: In prospective study adult troponin T ( TnT ) serum concentration determine day transcatheter closure atrial septal defect ( ASD ) patent foramen ovale ( PFO ) .
DOC.criteria: transcatheter ASD PFO closure University Hospital Lund , Sweden miss TnT value
